dict.string: When you look through the Phenakistiscope, you can see the couple dancing either slowly or quickly, depending on the speed of the scope's rotation.

The Phenakistscope has 13 images. This can be used as an indication for the number of seconds to choose for a smooth animation. Tap 'Run my Code' to see the couple dancing. Try different values to see how things change.

Select a reasonable number of seconds for a scope rotation by tapping on the blue number next to 'var numberOfSeconds ='. If you choose a value smaller than 1 second, it becomes difficult to see the individual images. At a value of 0.54 or less it will seem like a fluent but rather quick animation.
